name: Second Wind
storyline:
You (the player) start to have more and more visions and dreams of strange fortunes and futures, wandering monsters and odd structures, that lure you into The Dungeon.

5 gods influence your dreams in hope that you reach the PentPlane and put an end to their conflict. The gods of Order, Life, Time and Soul want you to kill Smith, the first human, while Smith wants you to kill the 4 gods and rule with him.
summary: Second Wind is a roguelike RPG in which you'll explore random dungeons as you battle monsters, upgrade your equipment and complete quests. You can choose and unlock new characters to play with, each character has 3 stats: dexterity, power and armor, which will increase or decrease during your adventure. Each character also has 3 unique battle moves, use them wisely!
